Translations.Text: Ism
Atnan issekniyen n Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ad ak d Neeku si tequii n Musa akked Feraun, s tidep, i ugdud iumnen
Ih, Feraun issem$weo iman is di tmurt; imezda$ ifeoq iten d ieoumen. Isrewrew iayfa segsen, izellu arrac nnsen, issidir tilawin nnsen. Ih, neppa seg ifessaden
Neb$a a Nfeooeo $ef wid irewrwen di tmurt, a ten Nerr d imeqwoanen, a ten Nerr d iweooaten
A ten Nesseqaad di tmurt. A Nessken i Feraun, Haman, akked iasekoiwen nnsen, ayen ppagwaden segsen
Nweeea i imma s n Musa: "ssuiiev it, sinna, ma tugadev fellas, err it ar wasif. Ur ppagwad, ur $webben. Ad am t id Nerr, u a t Nerr seg imazanen
Teddem it twacult n Feraun. Ad asen iu$al d acengu, d a$ilif. Ih, Feraun, Haman, akked iasekoiwen nnsen llan d imsaben
Tenna tmeiiut n Feraun: "d nnuib n tii, i nek akked kecc. Ur tneqq, ahat ad a$ infaa, ne$ a t nerr d mmit nne$". Nitni ur faqen ara
Temmar ed tasa n yimma s n Musa. Qoib it id tessken, lemmer ur Nzeyyeo ara ul is, iwakken a ppili si lmumnin
Tenna i ultma s: "evfeo it"! Teqquoa t si mbaid, nitni ur faqen
Uqbel, Negdel as tid iuuuiuven. Tenna: "ad awen ssekne$ axxam ar awen itkwelfen fellas, u nitni ad as bedden
Nerra t id i imma s, iwakken ad as kkawent wallen is, ur t$webben, iwakken a peeo ar lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep. Maca, tegwti degsen, ur ssinen
Mi meqqweo, ittaaqel, Nefka yas tussna, uuwab. Akka ay Nepkafi imdanen laali

Ikcem tamdint, di lweqt ideg stehzan imezda$ is. Iufa n sin irgazen pna$en, yiwen seg ueoum is, wayev seg icenga s. Win n ueoum is, issuter as d afus, mgal win n icenga s. Iwwet it Musa s lbunia, in$a t. Inna: "ayagi, seg igi n Cciian. Neppa, s tidep, d acengu n uuee, itellifen
Inna: "a Mass iw! Nek dense$ iman iw, Semmee iyi". Isemmee as. Ih, Neppa Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Inna: "a Mass iw! S l$it iK felli, ur ppili$, d awez$i, si loiha ibe$wviyen
Iufa d iman is di temdint, iugad, iquoaa. Atan a d ipaaggiv $uoes, win i s d issutren afus, ass izeryen. Inna yas Musa: "kecc, s tidep, d im$eooeq n uuee
Acengu nnsen, mi ib$a a t iwwet, inna d: "a Musa! Day teb$iv ad iyi ten$ev, akken ten$iv yiwen, ivelli? Teb$iv kan a ppiliv d aqehhao di tmurt, ur teb$iv ara a ppiliv seg iaaoviyen
Iusa d urgaz si iierf n temdint, ippazal. Inna d: "a Musa! S tidep, imvebboen mlalen $ef loal ik, a k n$en. Effe$, nek, seg wid ik ipweuuin
Iffe$ segs, iugad, iquoaa. Inna: "a Mass iw! Sellek iyi seg ugdud imednas
Mi ibbwi tikli ar Madian, inna: "ahat Mass iw ad iyi Iawi d ubrid umain

Mi ibbwev s aman n Madian, iufa n arbaa n l$aci, la sswan. Iufa, di iierf nnsen, snat n tlawin, iifent lmal nnsent. Inna: "d acu txeddmemt"? Nnant ed: "ur nesswa alamma wexxoen imeksawen. Babat ne$ d am$ao ameqwoan
Issew asent, iu$al ar tili, inna: "a Mass iw! Nek oe$be$ $ef yal lxio, ar iyi d Tessersev
Tusa t id yiwet segsent, s tikli ikukran, tenna: "atan ak d issawal baba, a k ikafi imi $ tesswev". Mi ioue $uoes, u ieka yas i ivoan, inna: "ur ppagwad, tepwasellkev seg ugdud imednas
Yiwet segsent, tenna: "a baba! Eiief it d acrik, ih, yif icriken ik, iohed, muman
Inna: "b$i$, nek, ad ak fke$ yiwet si yissi yagi, s cceot a pxedmev $uoi iam iseggwasen. Ma tessawdev mraw, s leb$i k. Ur b$i$ a k hejjne$. Ad ak ili$, ma Irad Oebbi, seg iaaoviyen
Irra: "ayagi, gari yidek. A tin saadda$ ger snat n tallitin, ur ippili felli u$ilif. Oebbi d Awkil, $ef wayen id nenna
Mi ifukk Musa tallit, u iseyyee akked twacult is, iwala times ar tama n udrar. Inna i twacult is: "qqimet, wala$ times, ahat ad awen d awi$, segs, asali ne$ asafu, amar a ppesseemum
Mi ibbwev $uoes, ipwanced ed si ttejoa, di rif ayeffus n te$zut, deg umviq ioqan: "a Musa! S tidep, Nek d Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Veggeo taakwazt ik". Mi p iwala, la tesseeoiiiw amzun d azrem, ibren ur iwexxeo. "A Musa! Qeddem, ur ppagwad, aql ak, ih, di laman
Err afus ik di loib ik, a d iffe$ d amellal, ur ihlik. Sseqoeb ed $uoek i$il ik, ad ak tekkes tugwdi. Tigi d sin n ppbut s$uo Mass ik, i Feraun akked imvebboen is. Ih, nitni d agdud iballa$en
Inna: "a Mass iw! Nek n$i$ yiwen segsen, ugade$ ad iyi n$en
Gma Harun yif iyi afeuuee umeslay. Azen it id yidi d amaiwen, ad iyi tebbet. Nek ugade$ ad iyi nekoen
Inna: "a Nesseohed tayepp ik s gma k. Ad awen Nefk, i sin, adabu; ur kwen id ppawven. S issekniyen nne£, d kunwi akked wid iddan yidwen ara irebeen
Mi ibbwev $uosen Musa, s issekniyen iberrzen, nnan: "ayagi, siwa sseur id innulfan. Ur nesli s waya, $uo ibabaten nne$ imezwura
Inna Musa: "Mass iw Ieoa sennig wiyav, anwa iwumi Ifka nnhaya s$uoeS, anwa ara d igwrin deg Uxxam. Imednas, s tidep, ur rebeen

Inna Feraun: "a yimvebboen, ur awen mli$ ara kra n oebbi, war nekkini. Ecaal iyi times ar talaxt, a Haman; bnu yi lbeoo aalayen; ahat ad ali$ ar OOebbi n Musa. Nek, s tidep, eesbe$ t seg wid iskiddiben
Neppa, akked iasekoiwen is, sme$woen iman nnsen di tmurt, war ssebba. £ilen, ar nitni, ur d ppu$alen $uone£
Neppa, akked iasekoiwen is, Neiief iten. Nger iten ar yill. Wali amek tevoa d imednas
Nerra ten d imeqwoanen i ineccden ar tmes. Ass n tnekra, ur ppusellken
Neqqen asen xezzu di ddunit agi. Ass n tnekra, nitni seg ucmiten
Ni$ Nefka Tazmamt i Musa, mbaad ma Nesqucc isuta imezwura. D tafat i imdanen, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Amar a d mmektin
Ur telliv ara di loiha utaram, mi Nseyya lameo i Musa. Ur telliv seg inagan
Maca, Nxelq ed tisuta, $wezzif laameo nnsent. Ur tellid seg imezda$ n Madian, la sen teqqarev issekniyen nne£. Maca, Nella Neppazen
Ur telliv ar tama n udrar, mi d Nessawel. Maca d aeunu s$uo Mass ik, iwakken a pnedrev agdud, u$uo ur d iusi uneddao, uqbel ik. Amar a d mmektin
Mulac, ma teuza ten tiyta id urwen ifassen nnsen, a d inin: "a Mass nne$! A lemmer i $ d Tuznev amazan, a neddu d issekniyen iK, a nili seg wid iumnen
Mi ten id tusa tidep s$uone£, nnan: "a lemmer id iusi am wayen id iusan i Musa"! Day ur ugin ara, zik, ayen id iusan i Musa? Nnan: "d sin sseurat". Mwafaqen, nnan: "nekwni nugi ten i sin
Ini: "awit ed Tazmamt, s$uo Oebbi, i yifen snat agi, i nnhaya, ad ddu$ yides, ma tessawalem tidep
Ma ur ak d rran ara, efhem ar ddan kan d lhawiyyat nnsen. Anwa innetlafen, sennig win iteddun d lhawiyya s, war nnhaya s$uo Oebbi? Oebbi, s tidep, ur Inehhu agdud imednas
Aql a£ Nessawwev asen awal, amendeo ma d mmektin
Umnen yis wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, uqbel tagi
Ma $oan asen t, ad inin: "numen yis. Ih, ar neppa d tidep, s$uo Mass nne$. Uqbel is, s tidep, nella d imvuaen
Wigi a ten id ias ukafi nnsen berdayen, $ef wayen ueboen, swexxioen tucmip s yise$, u seg wayen iten N$at, pseddiqen
Mi slan i yir awal, ad as veofen, u qaoen: "i nekwni igiten nne$, i kunwi igiten nnwen. Fellawen talwit. Ur neo$eb $ef at war tussna
Kecc, s tidep, ur tnehhuv win teemlev. Maca, Oebbi Inehhu win i S ihwan. Neppa, Yif akw akken Ieoa wid ipwanhan
Nnan: "ma nedda d nnhaya yidek, a nepwaxvef seg wakal nne$". Day ur ten Nesseqaad ara di loamaa n laman, u$uo d ppawvent yal l$ellat? D l$it s$uone£. Maca, tegwti degsen, ur eoin
Aceal Nesqucc n temdininn, cerraent di temaict nnsent. Atnan ixxamen nnsen, ay ten ized$en, deffir sen, siwa ixeiiayen. D Nekwni ay d iweooaten
Ur Isquccu Mass ik timdinin, alamma iuzen i imezda$ nnsent, amazan i sen immalen issekniyen nne£. Ur Nesquccu timdinin, mebla ma llan imezda$ nnsent, d imednas
Kra n wayen i wen ippunefken n cci, d zzhu n tmeddurt n ddunit, akked ccbue is. Ayen illan $eo Oebbi, yif it, ad idum kter. Day ur pmeyyizen ara
Day win iwumi Nefka lemaahda igerzen, u immuger ip, am win i Nezha s l$it n tmeddurt n ddunit; sinna, ass n tnekra, neppa seg wid ara d irsen
Ass ideg ara sen d Isiwel, ad Yini: "anda ten wid iyY tepcarakem, u tellam tepkabarem
A d inin wid i$ef iuao wawal: "a Mass nne$! Wigi i njeggee, njeggee iten, akken i nepwajeggee. A nzekki $ureK: macci d nekwni ay aabden
Ad asen inin: "naaoet wid tepcarakem". Ad ten naaoen, ur asen d pparan. Walan aaaqeb. A lemmer llan pwanhan
Ass ideg ara sen d Isiwel, ad Yini: "acu d terram i imazanen
Assen, ad dergen fellasen isalen, nitni ur pmesteqsayen
Ma d win isteooaen, iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan, ahat ad yili seg imerbae
Mass ik Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan, u Ismenyafa. Ur ten id iuae usmenyif. Gedha s Oebbi! I Aalay sennig wayen pcaraken
Mass ik Ieoa ayen iffren deg idmaren nnsen, akked wayen cennaen
Neppa d Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. I Neppa, annuz di tmezwarut, u di tneggarut. I Neppa aeuddu, $uoeS tu$alin nnwen
Ini: "acu tmeyyzem, ma Isse$li d Oebbi iv imezgi, fellawen, alamma d ass n tnekra? Anwa oebbi, war Oebbi, ara wen d iawin tafat? Day ur tsellem ara
Ini: "acu tmeyyzem, ma Issuli Oebbi ass imezgi, fellawen, alamma d ass n tnekra? Anwa oebbi, war Oebbi, ara wen d iawin iv, a ppestaafum degs? Day ur tepwalim ara
Seg ueunu S, Iga yawen iv akked wass, i ustaafu nnwen, akked unadi n lfevl iS. Amar a ppesnemmrem
Ass ideg ara sen d Isiwel, ad asen Yini: "anda ten wid iyY tepcarakem, u tellam tepkabarem
A d Nawi anagi, si yal lois. A Nini: "awit ed atebbet nnwen". Ad eoen ar tidep n Oebbi. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen
Ih, Qaoun illa seg ugdud n Musa. Iqeho iten. Nefka yas igerrujen; s tezmert ugraw ioehden, arfad n tsura nnsen. Mi s inna ugdud is: "ur zehhu! Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara izehwaniyen
Deg wayen i k Ifka Oebbi, nadi axxam aneggaru. Ur teppu amur ik, di ddunit. Elhu, akken i Ilha Oebbi $uoek. Ur ssaram lefsad di tmurt. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ifessaden
Inna: "ippunefk iyi kan, ilmend n tmusni i sai$". Day ur ieoa ara ar Oebbi Isqucc, uqbel is, ger isuta, wid i t iugaren di tezmert, isemmden kteo? Ur illi usteqsi ibe$wviyen, af ibekkaven nnsen
Iffe$ ed s agdud is, s ooeue is. Wid ib$an tameddurt n ddunit, nnan: "awufan nesaa am wayen ippunefken i Qaoun! Ih, neppa d bab n terkunt tabarart
Wid, iwumi teppunefk tmusni, nnan: "a ssexv nnwen! Ppwab n Oebbi yif it, i win iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Ara d iuae siwa win iueboen
Nger it seddaw tmurt, neppa akked uxxam is. Ur as telli terbaat ara t isellken, war Oebbi. Ur illi seg wid ipselliken iman nnsen
Wid issaramen amkan is, ivelli nni, u$alen nnan: "zi$ Oebbi Issugut ooeeq i win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS, u iwezzen. Lemmer ur a$ I$at ara Oebbi, yili Iger a$ seddaw tmurt. Ih, ur rebeen ijehliyen
Axxam nni aneggaru, a t Nerr i wid ijunben tem$weo akked usefsed, di tmurt. Tirect i wid ipeezziben
Win id iusan s yise$, ad iawi ayen it yifen. Win id iusan s tucmip, ihi, ad ppuqeiiin wid ixedmen tucmitin, $ef wayen kan xeddmen
Ih, Win Ilezmen fellak Leqwoan, war ccekk, a k id Irr s axxam. Ini: "Mass iw Yif akw akken Issen anwa id iusan s nnhaya, anwa i illan di ttelfan n uuee
Ur tessarmev ara, ad ak ed ters Tezmamt, lemmer macci d aeunu s$uo Mass ik. Ur ppili d amaiwen ijehliyen
Ur k swexxioen seg issekniyen n Oebbi, deffir trusi nnsen $uoek. Nuj ar Mass ik, ur ppili seg wid ipcaraken
Ur naao, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven. Ur illi oebbi, siwa Neppa. Yal cci ad inger, siwa udem iS. IneS aeuddu. £ureS ara tu$alem
